item.description:
Ciao,

We will be meeting at the fountain at the Piazza near Venda Ravioli.Â We will decide from there where to go. All are welcome to come to this open event. There is no cost for the evening except any food or drink you have that night. We hope to continue using our Italian language skills that night if you like. Hope all can make it.

Ciao,

John Amato

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting at the fountain at 6pm. We will decide where to go from there.

group.name: The Rhode Island Italian Language Meetup Group

item.name: Mangia e Bevi nel Federal Hill
